**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 281 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This oak branch grows leaves in spring that change color in autumn and shed in winter. While wielding it, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify plants and fungi. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells. Verdant Staff **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 281 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 225 gp ---
  • **Cantrip** [_tangle vine_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1713)
  • **1st** [_runic body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1657), [_runic weapon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1658)
  • **2nd** [_entangling flora_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1515), [_oaken resilience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1617), [_one with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1618), [_shape wood_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1668)
Verdant Staff (Greater) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 281 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 1,750 gp ---
  • **3rd** [_wall of thorns_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1752), speak with plants
  • **4th** oaken resilience, speak with plants
  • **5th** [_plant form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1637), wall of thorns
name: Verdant Staff
